meanings.meaning_en_US: Relevant or suitable in a particular situation.

examples.sentence: The rules are only [applicable] to certain cases.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些規則僅適用於某些情況。

examples.sentence: Ensure that the guidelines are [applicable] to your work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保這些指導方針適用於你的工作。

examples.sentence: He questioned whether the law was [applicable] here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他質疑這項法律在這裡是否適用。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A guarantee given to a purchaser by a seller, promising to fix or replace a defective product.

examples.sentence: The TV comes with a two-year [warranty].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這台電視有兩年的保固。

examples.sentence: Make sure to keep the receipt for the [warranty] claim.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保保留收據以便保固索賠。

examples.sentence: The car [warranty] covers most repairs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個汽車保固涵蓋大多數修理。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Consisting of many different kinds; varied.

examples.sentence: She has a [miscellaneous] collection of antiques.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有一個多種多樣的古董收藏。

examples.sentence: The report includes [miscellaneous] information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告包括多種多樣的信息。

examples.sentence: The box contained [miscellaneous] items from my travels.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個盒子裡有我旅行中收集的多種多樣的物品。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A fault, defect, or weakness.

examples.sentence: Greed is often considered a [vice].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 貪婪常被視為一種惡習。

examples.sentence: He struggled to overcome his [vice].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他努力克服自己的惡習。

examples.sentence: Every character has a [vice] hidden behind their virtues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個角色在美德背後都有一個隱藏的惡習。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move quickly or to increase in size or intensity.

examples.sentence: The car [zoomed] past us on the highway.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那輛車在高速公路上快速經過我們。

examples.sentence: I like to [zoom] in on the details of the picture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡放大圖片中的細節。

examples.sentence: The child [zoomed] around the park on his bike.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那孩子在公園裡騎著他的自行車快速移動。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An article in a publication expressing the opinion of its editors or publishers.

examples.sentence: The [editorial] on climate change was thought-provoking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 關於氣候變化的社論引人深思。

examples.sentence: She wrote an [editorial] advocating for better education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她寫了一篇社論主張改善教育。

examples.sentence: The [editorial] team meets every week to discuss issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 社論團隊每週會面討論問題。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of putting food on a plate or in a bowl.

examples.sentence: The chef is [serving] dinner to the guests.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 廚師正在給客人上菜。

examples.sentence: Each [serving] of pasta was large enough to fill anyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每份義大利麵都足以讓人填飽肚子。

examples.sentence: She enjoys [serving] her friends delicious meals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡為朋友們上美味的餐點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Consisting of two parts, elements, or aspects.

examples.sentence: He has a [dual] citizenship in the U.S. and Canada.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在美國和加拿大擁有雙重國籍。

examples.sentence: The system offers [dual] functionalities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該系統提供雙重功能。

examples.sentence: They enjoyed a [dual] role in the performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在演出中享受雙重角色。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A retail shop where medicinal drugs are dispensed and sold.

examples.sentence: You can pick up your prescription at the [pharmacy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在藥房領取你的處方。

examples.sentence: The local [pharmacy] is open 24 hours.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當地的藥房24小時營業。

examples.sentence: Make sure to bring your insurance card to the [pharmacy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保攜帶你的保險卡去藥房。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The head of a committee or organization.

examples.sentence: The [chairman] called the meeting to order.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 主席宣佈會議開始

examples.sentence: The [chairman] presented the annual report to the board.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 主席向董事會提交年報

examples.sentence: He has served as [chairman] for over five years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他已擔任主席超過五年

meanings.meaning_en_US: A place of study or training in a special field.

examples.sentence: She graduated from a prestigious [academy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從一所著名的學院畢業。

examples.sentence: The [academy] offers various programs for students.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個學院為學生提供各種課程。

examples.sentence: He teaches at a local art [academy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在當地的一所藝術學院任教。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A sleeveless outer garment, typically worn over the shoulders.

examples.sentence: The superhero wore a [cape] that flowed behind him.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 超級英雄穿著斗篷，隨風飄揚。

examples.sentence: She wrapped herself in a warm [cape] during the winter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 冬天她用一條保暖的斗篷裹住自己。

examples.sentence: The [cape] added flair to her costume.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這件斗篷為她的服裝增添了風格。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An advance showing of a film, play, or other production.

examples.sentence: I watched the [preview] of the new movie online.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在網上看到了新電影的預覽。

examples.sentence: The [preview] was very exciting and increased my anticipation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個預覽非常令人興奮，增加了我的期待。

examples.sentence: They released a [preview] of the show to attract viewers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們發布了節目的預覽以吸引觀眾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of making or agreeing to make an advance payment in order to receive or participate in something.

examples.sentence: My [subscription] to the service is about to expire.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我對這項服務的訂閱即將到期。

examples.sentence: She received a confirmation for her [subscription] today.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她今天收到了她的訂閱確認。

examples.sentence: The [subscription] fee has increased this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今年的訂閱費用上漲了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A symbol, word, or words legally registered or established by use as representing a company or product.

examples.sentence: The logo is a well-known [trademark] of the brand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個標誌是該品牌的知名商標

examples.sentence: They applied for a [trademark] to protect their product.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們申請了一個商標以保護他們的產品

examples.sentence: A [trademark] can help differentiate your products in the market.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 商標可以幫助您的產品在市場上區分開來

meanings.meaning_en_US: A publication issued in successive parts.

examples.sentence: He writes a [serial] for the local newspaper.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為當地的報紙寫一個期刊。

examples.sentence: The [serial] was exciting and had many fans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個期刊很精彩，擁有很多粉絲。

examples.sentence: I collected every [serial] published last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我收集了去年出版的每一期期刊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A type of fish that is commonly found in freshwater environments.

examples.sentence: I caught a huge [bass] at the lake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在湖裡抓到了一條大鱸魚

examples.sentence: The fisherman said that the best time to catch [bass] is early in the morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 漁夫說，早上捕捉鱸魚的最佳時間是清晨

examples.sentence: He specializes in fishing for [bass] during the summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他專門在夏天釣鱸魚

meanings.meaning_en_US: A book or set of books giving information on many subjects or on many aspects of one subject.

examples.sentence: He checked the [encyclopedia] for information on ancient civilizations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他查閱了百科全書以獲取有關古代文明的信息。

examples.sentence: Many schools have their own [encyclopedias] for reference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多學校都有自己的百科全書作為參考。

examples.sentence: An online [encyclopedia] is a great resource for students.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在線百科全書是學生的絕佳資源。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An official count or survey of a population, typically recording various details of individuals.

examples.sentence: The government conducted a [census] every ten years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府每十年進行一次人口普查

examples.sentence: Participants were asked to fill out the [census] forms carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 參與者被要求仔細填寫人口普查表格

examples.sentence: The results of the [census] are important for policy planning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 人口普查的結果對政策規劃至關重要

meanings.meaning_en_US: Conformity or agreement.

examples.sentence: We acted in [accordance] with the guidelines.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們按照指導方針行事。

examples.sentence: The changes were made in [accordance] with the law.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些變更是根據法律進行的。

examples.sentence: In [accordance] with company policy, we will proceed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 根據公司的政策，我們將繼續進行。
